location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

2. Arizona: This is another unambiguous location mentioned in the paragraph. It is a state located in the southwestern region of the United States.

Therefore, the location entities in the paragraph are "Dallas" and "Arizona".
